title: Extraction of sleep information from clinical notes of Alzheimer's disease patients using natural language processing
details: S Sivarajkumar, TYC Tam, HA Mohammad, S Viggiano… - Journal of the American …, 2024
abstract: Objectives Alzheimer's disease (AD) is the most common form of dementia in the United States. Sleep is one of the lifestyle-related factors that has been shown critical for optimal cognitive function in old age. However, there is a lack of research …
